result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael P Leas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Impersonating a Peace Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.70(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Huber with standard release conditions.
Concurrent with: Count 2, Cases 16CM201 and 15CT1368, if revoked.

Court will allow for transfer to Milwaukee County.
Concurrent with: Count 2, Cases 16CM201 and 15CT1368.

miscConds.notes: Cash bail applied.  PAID IN FULL.  Balance of cash bail to be refunded to poster.  Court waives DNA surcharge and sample.
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling (in lieu of employment - SSI or Retirement).
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended by agent.
Mental health evaluation and treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.

Anger Management and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No violent contact with sister or her family and contact only with her permission and under her conditions.
Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Michael P Leas in court with attorney Bradley J. Bloch.  

Defendant enters pleas of No Contest to counts 1 & 2.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of counts 1 & 2.


Court orders the following:
Count 1:
90  Days in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
Concurrent to:  Count 2, 16CM201 & 15CT1368
STAYED.

Term of Probation:  2 Years.
Court will allow for transfer to Milwaukee County.
Concurrent to:  Count 2, 16CM201 & 15CT1368
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
Anger Management and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling (in Lieu of employment - SSI or Retirement).
No Violent Contact with:  his sister or her family and only with her permission and under her conditions.
Mental Heath evaluation and treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.
Do not operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

Costs:  $243
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  Court waives.
Apply bail to counts 1 & 2 and refund any balance to the posting party.






Count 2:
8 Months in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
Concurrent to:  Count 1, 16CM201 & 15CT1368
STAYED.

Term of Probation:  2 Years.
Court will allow for transfer to Milwaukee County.
Concurrent to:  Count 1,  16CM201 & 15CT1368.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
Same as count 1.

Costs:  $243
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  Court waives.
Apply bail to counts 1 & 2 and refund any balance to the posting party.

CONDITION TIME:
45 Days in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
STAYED - To be used at the agents discretion.
